attributes.action: Save Play.com and reinstate Low Value Consignment Relief
attributes.additional_details:
We wish for a more transparent Low Value Consignment Relief to enable major e-commerce businesses, such as Play.com, to go back a thriving business.
This will prevent not only the job losses in Play.com's Jersey, Cambridge and Bristol locations, but will create further jobs within this company and other less established enterprises and the larger global brands.
